title: Consultation and preventive examination
desc: It is not medical advice. Always consult your doctor for appropriate examinations, treatment, testing, and care recommendations.

title: Teeth whitening
desc: With professional Teeth Whitening treatment, you can enjoy the boost in confidence of a bright, white smile.

title: Treatment of caries and complications
desc: If dental caries is left untreated for a more extended period, it may lead to several complications based on the nature of the carious lesion.

title: Oral hygiene
desc: Oral hygiene is the practice of keeping the mouth clean, and is considered to be the best means of prevention of cavities.

title: Elimination of plaque and stone
desc: Dental hygiene refers to the practice of keeping the mouth, teeth, and gums clean and healthy to prevent disease.

title: Restoration of destroyed crowns of teeth
desc: Dentists can apply both dental crowns and veneers to any tooth, including those exposed ... A single veneer can be used to cover a broken or chipped tooth

title: Prosthetics (metal, metal-ceramic)
desc: Metal Ceramic Prosthodonstics Advantages · The natural tooth shade and structure imitation; · The tooth surface does not get dim.

title: Aesthetic restoration of teeth
desc: Aesthetic restoration is reproducing of natural tooth form, its color, transparency and other optical and physical properties by means of modern filling materials.
